title: HOUR 1 - LeBron, Rodgers, MLB
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - LeBron, Rodgers, MLB
description:
It might be time for the Lakers to move on from LeBron James

Aaron Rodgers will be making his decision soon

MLB better not wait too long to get a deal done


Guest: Sam Amick
